We need access to Bluetooth to connect to devices.
We need access to the camera to take photos and videos.
We need access to your location at all times to provide real-time notifications about new properties, open houses, and local market updates based on your location.
The app requires temporary access to your precise location to help you find properties nearby and navigate to selected properties or open houses.
This app needs access to your location to show nearby properties, open houses, and local amenities when the app is open.
We need access to the microphone to record audio.
We need access to the photo library to save photos.
We need access to the photo library to read your photos.
We need access to speech recognition to provide voice search functionality.
We need permission to send notifications.
